formElement.label: Status

item.label: Closed
item.description: The artifact is no longer active. See the Resolution field for details on how it was resolved.

formElement.name: hours
formElement.label: Effort
formElement.description: Number of hours of work needed to fix the artifact (including testing)

formElement.name: percent
formElement.label: Percentage of completion (1-100)
formElement.description: Integer value between 0-100

formElement.name: submitted_by
formElement.label: Submitted by
formElement.description: User who originally submitted the artifact

formElement.name: open_date
formElement.label: Submitted on
formElement.description: Date and time for the initial artifact submission

formElement.name: artifact_id
formElement.label: Artifact ID
formElement.description: Unique artifact identifier

formElement.name: severity
formElement.label: Priority
formElement.description: How quickly the artifact must be completed

formElement.name: subproject_id
formElement.label: Subproject
formElement.description: Generally correspond to high level modules or functionalities of your software (e.g. User interface, Configuration Manager, Scheduler, Memory Manager...)

formElement.name: last_update_date
formElement.label: Last Modified On
formElement.description: Date and time of the latest modification in an artifact

formElement.name: close_date
formElement.label: Close Date
formElement.description: Close Date

formElement.name: stage
formElement.label: Stage
formElement.description: Stage in the life cycle of the artifact

item.label: New
item.description: The artifact has just been submitted

item.label: Analyzed
item.description: The cause of the artifact has been identified and documented

item.label: Accepted
item.description: The artifact will be worked on.

item.label: Under Implementation
item.description: The artifact is being worked on.

item.label: Ready for Review
item.description: Updated/Created non-software work product (e.g. documentation) is ready for review and approval.

item.label: Ready for Test
item.description: Updated/Created software is ready to be included in the next build

item.label: In Test
item.description: Updated/Created software is in the build and is ready to enter the test phase

item.label: Approved
item.description: The artifact fix has been succesfully tested. It is approved and awaiting release.

formElement.name: fieldset_3
formElement.label: CC List
formElement.description: Dependency links from an artifact to one or several other artifacts

formElement.name: fieldset_4
formElement.label: Attachments
formElement.description: Attach virtually any piece of information to an artifact in the form of a file

formElement.name: fieldset_5
formElement.label: Dependencies
formElement.description: Establish a dependency link from an artifact to one or several other artifacts belonging to any of the tracker of any project

formElement.name: fieldset_6
formElement.label: References
formElement.description: Cross-reference any artifact, or any other object

formElement.name: fieldset_7
formElement.label: Permissions
formElement.description: Restrict access to artifact
